about.me: We are Malaysians who want to participate in the Cardano network as we believe DeFi is the future. We are donating some of our proceedings to charity once we are profitable. Follow our Twitter page to keep up with us.
about.server: We have 3 separate bare metal nodes which comprise of 2 Relay nodes and 1 Block producing node. All three nodes run on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS server edition for maximum reliability. We are excited to let you know that two of our nodes are run from Raspberry Pi 4B 8GB with binaries compiled from source for the aarch64 architecture. We also have an additional x86-64 linux-PC to act as a backup relay/block node if needed.
